subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Mikel Astarloza tested positive for doping on June 26, eight days before the Tour began. Cycling’s governing body also suspended the Italian rider Riccardo Ricco.
snippet: Mikel Astarloza tested positive for doping on June 26, eight days before the Tour began. Cycling’s governing body also suspended the Italian rider Riccardo Ricco.
